prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with bright red feathers and a fierce expression.
I want a small bird Pokemon design that evokes speed and agility in its appearance.
Generate a Pokemon that has a sleek body, sharp beak, and striking color patterns.
Make a wild Pokemon with a vibrant color palette, showcasing its energetic personality.
Imagine a feathered creature that thrives in urban areas and has a mischievous demeanor.
Design a Pokemon inspired by real birds, focusing on its dynamic poses and colors.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of freedom with its winged form.
